backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister with an empty actor.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking post-deploy verification script to a set of components and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing short summaries for numerous frontend source files.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Mainnet deployment guide with prerequisites and step-by-step instructions.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining light/dark theme OKLCH variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the AdSense script and mounting the React app.
frontend/public/ads.txt: Contains required single-line AdSense publisher record.
frontend/scripts/post-deploy-verify.sh: Shell script to verify mainnet deployment, ads.txt accessibility, and core UI behavior.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component controlling navigation between tool pages.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper adding header, ad banners, footer, and navigation handling.
frontend/src/components/ImagePreview.tsx: Component showing original and resized images with dimension info.
frontend/src/components/QrPreview.tsx: Canvas renderer that draws a QR code matrix.
frontend/src/components/WrappingTabsHead: Tabs header component that wraps triggers across lines.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and refreshing an IC backend actor based on user identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports a placeholder hook that returns an empty object since no backend queries are used.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, including color palettes and global styles.
frontend/src/lib/clipboard.ts: Implements a clipboard copy helper that writes text to the clipboard and shows toast notifications on success or failure.
frontend/src/lib/dailyUtilities.ts: Contains utilities for time zones, timers, pomodoro calculations, alarms, and time formatting functions.
frontend/src/lib/image.ts: Resizes an image by drawing it to a canvas and returning a blob URL of the resized output.
frontend/src/lib/names.ts: Generates random first, last, or full names using predefined name lists and avoids duplicates.
frontend/src/lib/numberTools.ts: Provides percentage, tip, bill-splitting, age, date-difference, and time-duration calculation utilities.
frontend/src/lib/password.ts: Generates secure random passwords based on selected character sets and ensures required character types are included.
frontend/src/lib/qr.ts: Creates a simple QR-like boolean matrix with finder and timing patterns and a basic text-based encoding scheme.
frontend/src/lib/textTools.ts: Provides text manipulation utilities including case conversion, counting, sorting, formatting, slug generation, and lorem ipsum creation.
frontend/src/lib/units.ts: Defines unit categories and conversion logic for length, weight, temperature, and volume.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/DailyUtilitiesPage.ts: Implements a page offering timers, stopwatch, pomodoro, alarms, time zones, calendars, and shift calculations with associated UI state.
frontend/src/pages/HubPage.tsx: Displays a navigable hub of tool categories with cards linking to different utility pages.
frontend/src/pages/ImageResizerPage.tsx: Allows users to upload an image, adjust dimensions with optional aspect lock, resize it, and download the result.
frontend/src/pages/NumberConversionTools: Contains calculators for percentages, tips, dates, time, bases, currencies, units, and random number generation with interactive UI state.
frontend/src/pages/PasswordPage.tsx: A password generator page with customizable character options, length control, and clipboard copy support.
frontend/src/pages/PopularToolsPage.tsx: A multipurpose tools page providing QR generation, password creation, image resizing, unit conversion, and random name generation.
frontend/src/pages/QrCodePage.tsx: A QR code generator that converts input text into a matrix preview and allows downloading the generated QR image.
frontend/src/pages/RandomNamePage.tsx: A random name generator with selectable name style, adjustable count, and individual or bulk copy options.
A text utilities page offering case conversion, counting, deduplication, sorting, slug creation, lorem ipsum generation, hashtags, and emoji tools.
frontend/src/pages/UnitConverterPage.tsx: React page that selects a unit category, converts values between units using convert(), and updates UI with selects and inputs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config extending colors, animations, and container settings, and enabling typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current app features, ads notes, known issues, and versioned feature list for the micro tools hub.
